XRRayMatrix.summary: The read-only matrix property of the interface is a transform that can be used to position objects along the XRRay. This is a 4 by 4 matrix given as a 16 element in column major order.

remarks.para: The transform from a ray originates at [0, 0, 0] and extends down the negative z-axis to the ray described by the XRRay's origin and direction.

XRRayMatrix.value: A 16 element object representing a 4 by 4 matrix in column major order.
